definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

pinyin: ren2 xing2 di4 xia4 tong1 dao4
pai2 wu1 di4 xia4 zhu3 guan3 wang3

definition: to go underground/to turn to secret activities

sentences.english: Bus routes and railways, both overground and underground, converged on the station.
sentences.chinese: 公共汽車線路和地上地下路軌都在該站交匯。

sentences.english: The invention discloses a construction method for a door opening of an old structural underground wall.
sentences.chinese: 本發明公開了一種老結構地下牆開門洞施工方法。

sentences.english: In the basement where Yang is living, there are many aisles leading to different rooms.
sentences.chinese: 在楊生活的這個地下室，有很多通道通往各個房間。

sentences.english: This article aims to analyze various processing methods for groundwater excavation of the foundation ditch in earthwork construction.
sentences.chinese: 分析土方工程施工中基坑開挖地下水的各種處理辦法。

sentences.english: I had to go below ground to an office where I spoke to a policeman.
sentences.chinese: 我走到了地下的一間辦公室才和一個警察說上話。

sentences.english: Collapse distribution centres on the intensive runoff zones.
sentences.chinese: 在地下水強徑流帶，塌陷分佈較爲密集。

sentences.english: Underground engineering is frequently threatened by ground water irruption.
sentences.chinese: 地下工程常常面臨突水災害的威脅。

sentences.english: And while we’re talking about chores, the light in the basement burned out.
sentences.chinese: 既然在談家務事，地下室的燈泡燒壞了。

sentences.english: The solid mineralizing model for a underground gold mine is researched on the basis of orebody block as a unit.
sentences.chinese: 以礦塊爲單位，研究某地下金礦的實體礦化模型。

sentences.english: This part of the underground tunnel leads to the sea.
sentences.chinese: 地下隧道的這部分通向大海。

sentences.english: For ten years, he led his men in the search for the buried gold.
sentences.chinese: 他帶領手下人，花了十年時間在尋找埋在地下的金子。

sentences.english: Sauna center on the basement floor, beauty center.
sentences.chinese: 位於酒店地下一層的洗浴中心，美容美髮中心。

sentences.english: Pet Health Animal Clinic, G/F, 24 Sai Yee Street, Mongkok, Kowloon, Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 柏得康動物診所，香港九龍旺角洗衣街24號地下。

sentences.english: The heat storage cement block is arranged underground a straw storehouse.
sentences.chinese: 儲熱水泥塊在存草倉的地下。

sentences.english: As a kind of water resource, Groundwater is of great importance in Dezhou.
sentences.chinese: 地下水是德州市重要的水資源。

sentences.english: Chapter two is the exploration on nomological basis of underground space exploitation.
sentences.chinese: 第二章爲地下空間開發利用法理基礎探究。

definition: vertical shaft (for mining, ventilation systems etc)
underground palace (as part of imperial tomb)
to dig out/to excavate/to scoop out
to dig into/to cut a mine into
